attributes.action: Sacrifice economic growth and save the planet
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why does economic growth always come first? Until the need to save the planet supersedes the supposed 'need' to grow economically i.e. when most of us are overheating and starving, it seems there will be no sensible policy on climate change. Remove greed and selfishness from the list of our society's virtues. Set the only example we can that will save the planet.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
